name: File Exchange
description:
FOR WEB BUILD: FULLSCREEN IT UP. If you have any bugs, try the exe.

A splitscreen 2 player vs shooter/platformer where your framerate is your health! Fire core game mechanics at each other.

Made for Ludum Dare 42 Jam. The theme was "Running out of space"

By JohnLee Cooper and Silver Lewis

supports 2 players on 1 keyboard or xbox controllers.

controls are explained in game.
